title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Special Edition Hashira Training Arc Part 2
overview: A recap of Kimetsu no Yaiba episodes 60â€“63, The members of the Demon Slayer Corps and their highest-ranking swordsmen, the Hashira. In preparation for the forthcoming final battle against Muzan Kibutsuji, the Hashira Training commences. While each carry faith and determination within their hearts, Tanjiro and the Hashira enter a new story.
